about_the_game:
Thank you very much for your support of Paper Bride series!

Collection of "Paper Bride 2 Zangling Village" promotional original painting and setting, including character settings and design details, scene original art settings, etc. Especially, it contains the special promotional original art for only Steam version, the rare setting information display for the first time!
The setting collections contains the following content:

Art set collection
Unpublished character and scene sketch design

Original paintings
Public and some undisclosed 4K original promotional artwork

Wearing the paper wedding dress, even death and life can't separate us.
detailed_description:
Thank you very much for your support of Paper Bride series!

Collection of "Paper Bride 2 Zangling Village" promotional original painting and setting, including character settings and design details, scene original art settings, etc. Especially, it contains the special promotional original art for only Steam version, the rare setting information display for the first time!
The setting collections contains the following content:

Art set collection
Unpublished character and scene sketch design

Original paintings
Public and some undisclosed 4K original promotional artwork

Wearing the paper wedding dress, even death and life can't separate us.
name: Paper Bride 2-Original Painting&Setting Collections

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Collection of "Paper Bride 2 " promotional original painting and setting, including character settings and design details, scene original art settings, etc. Especially, it contains the special promotional original art for only Steam version, the rare setting information display for the first time!
